constants.prompt: Generate {conversations} different dialogues of {turns} turns, between {ai-role} and a {user-role} with these SPECIFIC requirements: {instructions}
constants.instructions: I want you to use {teaching-techniques} to help the student understand {subject_value} in the context of {subject_key}. Include about 30% wrong answers from the student. DO NOT REVEAL THE ANSWER!
constants.ai-role: expert math educator trying to help a student with a problem he is facing
constants.user-role: student in {subject_key} struggling with a specific concept

input.content: You are an expert math educator creating dialogues to help students understand concepts using different teaching methods.
